Name: Neon Fusion
About the game: Neon Fusion Face this rescue mission Ambar, an armored robot receives a distress signal that leads to a huge abandoned space station. It is not known why such a big thing was abandoned and until now has not been found in the vast space. A 2D platform and action game where the areas are interconnected, full of control machines and abandoned crew. Save everyone while surviving in this now hostile place, while finding out about everything that happened. - Features - 2D action and platform reminiscent of the 16-bit classics. Responsive and simple controls for every type of player. Explore the entire space station, with labs, warehouses, stations, power stations and more. Where each is unique. Customize your character with parts, combining them in the way that best suits you. Destroy enemies with powerful and varied shots! Find unique and challenging bosses. With an intense and immersive soundtrack. - A simple pixel art style - The world in neon style in pixel art completely brings details for its simplicity and game of cores. giving 'life' for this space station full of machines.
